00037 #ifndef _SINGLETON_H__
00038 #define _SINGLETON_H__
00039 
00040 // Added by Steve Streeting for Ogre
00041 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00042 #include "OgreHeaderPrefix.h"
00043 
00044 #if OGRE_COMPILER == OGRE_COMPILER_MSVC
00045 // Turn off warnings generated by this singleton implementation
00046 #   pragma warning (disable : 4311)
00047 #   pragma warning (disable : 4312)
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if defined ( OGRE_GCC_VISIBILITY )
00051 #   pragma GCC visibility push(default)
00052 #endif
00053 namespace Ogre {
00061 // End SJS additions
00064     template <typename T> class Singleton
00065     {
00066     private:
00068         Singleton(const Singleton<T> &);
00069 
00071         Singleton& operator=(const Singleton<T> &);
00072     
00073     protected:
00074 
00075         static T* ms_Singleton;
00076 
00077     public:
00078         Singleton( void )
00079         {
00080             assert( !ms_Singleton );
00081 #if defined( _MSC_VER ) && _MSC_VER < 1200   
00082             int offset = (int)(T*)1 - (int)(Singleton <T>*)(T*)1;
00083             ms_Singleton = (T*)((int)this + offset);
00084 #else
00085         ms_Singleton = static_cast< T* >( this );
00086 #endif
00087         }
00088         ~Singleton( void )
00089             {  assert( ms_Singleton );  ms_Singleton = 0;  }
00090         static T& getSingleton( void )
00091         {   assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton ); }
00092         static T* getSingletonPtr( void )
00093         { return ms_Singleton; }
00094     };
00098 }
00099 #if defined ( OGRE_GCC_VISIBILITY )
00100 #   pragma GCC visibility pop
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 #include "OgreHeaderSuffix.h"
00104 #endif
